title: Characteristics and Instruction of Pupils with Mild/Moderate Disabilities
description: Advanced studies and skills in educational consultation. Emphasis on the collaborative and consultative role of the special educator with a wide range of individuals from diverse cultural backgrounds including school personnel, parents, outside agencies, and paraprofessionals. 3 seminars, 2 activities.
prerequisites: Admission into the Level I Special Education Credential Program and master's degree program in education
